name: Nokia 3310 Space Platformer
description:
[EPILEPSY WARNING - this game contains very intense flashing effects]

2D platformer made for the January 2021 Berlin Mini Jam

The game jam themes were "only 2 colors" and "pure chaos"
We chose to only use the colors of the nokia 3310 (idea from the nokia 3310 jam)

Controls:

walk left/right
Arrow Keys
jumpSpaceshift dimension
Left Click

made by

owsam - art

ScienceEnthusiast - music and art

Jannis - programming

Freddie - programming

Seebass22 - programming
